name: Ogre Chase: Fast paced, addictive platformer
name_original: Ogre Chase: Fast paced, addictive platformer
description:
Are you up for a new challenge? Meet Oggy and his friends!

He’s a cute little ogre who has a good knack for jumping: Avoid the obstacles and collect all of the coins!

It’s time to get to know Oggy and put on your best jumping shoes in this endless quest to jump and collect all of the coins on the way to victory.

Download absolutely FREE to start an epic new game and help Oggy and his mates to collect all of the coins to save his friends, now!

Collect coins in this fast paced platformer! You'll soon be telling your friends about OgreChase, the best game ever, no the best game in the world! It's more fun than the arcades!

Dodge the rotating spikes!

Leap onto the platforms!

Features:

★ Dodge spikes and platforms.
★ Collect coins and save them up to save Oggy’s best friends from the coin shop!
★ Test you reflexes and hone your reaction time.
★ Save up to collect all 15 (soon to be more!) playable characters.
★ Colourful, bright and vivid graphics!
★ Lightning fast jumps to dodge out of trouble.
★ It’s absolutely free, what else would you want?
★ Battle and challenge your friends to the top of the leaderboards to defeat and embarrass your friends!

Reviews:
